originalText.text: I would like to share my experience with Flying Solo. Our brand MONOSUIT has been collaborating with them since 2018. During this time, we participated in 7 shows, each had a fantastic atmosphere and professional approach to the arranging of the show! The store has great customers, a perfect selection of brands. Amazing fashion space in the heart of New York City on Broadway, I recommend it.

text.text: I would like to share my experience with Flying Solo. Our brand MONOSUIT has been collaborating with them since 2018. originalText.text: I am a designer of Feel Confidence brand! I would like to share my amazingly experience with Flying Solo, I want to thank this store for such an incredible opportunity of my life for my brand! My brand is selling very well at the store, team is amazing, the way I have my pieces at the store is so nice and caring. I am so thankful to Flying Solo and so happy to have my brand at the store! As a designer i would like to say that the beginning of the story to have your own small busses which you want to build big in the future is a lot of small steps and time, to see the way how it goes, each step is an experience which values a lot. Even when I have some weeks of no sales I don’t give up, first of all it’s an opportunity to have my brand in New York at such a cool boutique in Soho! And secondly It’s a journey which you should take seriously and still work on your brand, on the Instagram, advertising and a lot of many other things. Thank you Flying Solo! I’m so happy! ❤️

originalText.text: I have worked with Flying Solo for a few years now, and they are the most trusted and reliable partners. Customers have a great choice of the most exclusive, often one-of-a-kind pieces. And fashion brands and designers have a truly unique opprtunity to sell their designs in New York and to get published in top magazines! Very strong press attendance on their shows..which are always spectacular! The best of the best. Highly recommended.

text.text: I have worked with Flying Solo for a few years now, and they are the most trusted and reliable partners. Customers have a great choice of the most exclusive, often one-of-a-kind pieces. originalText.text: Our brand has been sold on Flying solo for several years, during which sales have been gradually growing, as well as brand awareness among buyers in New York.  Very polite employees and the most friendly team - the organization of their shows is always at a good level.  As is the solution to all problems.  Sales of the brand itself are not at a high level, but we often sell in large designer department stores and this is quite a normal story, when a person has a choice, he will not necessarily take only your clothes, as in a mono-brand boutique or in a boutique with 10-15 designers.  Flying solo gives even aspiring designers an opportunity to test their sales and stylists' interest.  We have never regretted selling here.

Flying solo gives even aspiring designers an opportunity to test their sales and stylists' interest.  We have never regretted selling here.

originalText.text: Wonderful shop with attentive help and original and lovely clothes. Having searched for “the” magic outfit in major stores I found two beautiful gowns for 2important events. Prices are fair. I am thrilled.
